name: The Wasteland
description: Most contemplated artwork from the series 'Dark Realities' by @trnvirsingh. The wasteland is a depiction of two sides of the world, from where we started to where we are at now. The hidden faces of an 'Ape" and 'Donald Trump' represents each side of the wasteland. The composition was designed in a way that the 'Donald Trump face is formed in the negative side in reflections and the ape face is formed with the edged of mountain on the right and positive side of the composition.
